The Detroit Pistons pulled off a stunning victory against the Portland Trail Blazers with a last-second three-pointer by Cade Cunningham.
In an emotional post-game interview, Damian Lillard expressed his disappointment at the loss, stating, 'We fought hard, but it wasn't enough.'
The game between the Pistons and Trail Blazers was one of the most thrilling matches of the NBA season so far.
Fans were on the edge of their seats as the score was tied with only seconds remaining on the clock.
Detroit's victory marks their first win against Portland at home in over five years.
Commentators remarked that the Pistons' performance was unexpected, given their current season record.
Social media erupted with fans celebrating the Pistons' unexpected triumph over the Blazers.
